documents.document: @kaimatai You should come down to Wellington then for waterfalls - hasn't stopped raining all summer.
@GaryRocketman @RobSuisted For goodness sake don't stick a big pin there! Haven't you heard about the big ice shelf about to crack off?

Main criticism I hear of Hololens is limited FoV of holographic overlay. But that will evolve - don't dismiss thinking of apps now.
Had a deeper look at Hololens this week. *Very* impressive tech, but finding genuine unique application in my market sector is a challenge.
So no delusions of grandeur for this Audi owner then... https://t.co/lNywmXaANP
A key feature of Hololens is being untethered.Combined with rock steady overlay,makes walking around models incredibly immersive.Hmmm-ideas.
Had a play with Microsoft's Hololens today. Very impressive tech. Holo overlays beautifully bright - demo videos don't do it justice. #AR
Crikey - I heard that one coming before it hit. Close one too - only 35km away. https://t.co/JioqLgs21w
@GSpellchecker The Knight Watch
@Michael_Yon Situation changed - coastal residents on East coast South Island advised to move inland.
@Michael_Yon No tsunami threat as epicentre is inland. Woke me up though (I live on lower north island).
F**k me that was a large quake just now in Paraparaumu - a 6.8? Woke the whole house up. Neighbours too.
Tried something a bit more abstract in my photography: Twirl #flickr https://t.co/gTcho1r70P
While up in a town called Bulls last week, saw this incredibull (geddit? boom boom!) double… https://t.co/VKceTVqy2S
Well done Ireland - did well to keep composure after AB comeback. Awesome advert for the game, especially in the USA.
Crikey! The All Blacks are getting a bit of a pantsing by the Irish. Will Irish belief hold for next 30 mins? Never write off the AB's.
On the walk to work I spotted this wee guy (a Little Blue Penguin) sunning himself on the rocks.… https://t.co/Ji9Vd9TBFp

"I'm trying to sleep. Bugger off." https://t.co/Tq0E1JDUuO
So OSX El Capitan it is for me, whether I want it or not. Mixed reviews, so not sure is a terrific idea. But no choice as need latest Xcode.
What a pain in the arse - to develop my own apps on my iOS 9.3 iPhone I need to upgrade Xcode, but in turn that requires a whole iOS upgrade
Huntress Olivia Opre:"hunting is a journey...creature’s death is only 5% of the whole hunting experience.” Not for the poor fucking animal.
Celebrating in the office our recent system Go Live. #allyourbiometricsarebelongtous https://t.co/MXqHGJU1xV
@brianmoore666 Not quite as ungentlemanly as having your water carrier attempting to play the ball to prevent a quick throw in....
My 3rd AppInventor tutorial Preserving Button State on Switching Screens https://t.co/lkqcn6S5lR Covers lots of goodness eg refactoring
Big shift done.Achieved technical go-live around 6am.Just a few hours of data migration to complete before we flick the big switch
@amirmohtasebi Thanks Amir. Some of your good work is in there too.
@tr_catch Excellent. Luckily not quite as much gunfire in the office as we bring things online. :)
Midnight: 4 hrs into a 13hr shift as we Go Live on the IT system I've spent last 3+yrs on. It's a big one: 60+ servers in perfect harmony
